Title: The Oath
Writer: Joseph Weisberg (creator), Joshua Brand, Melissa James Gibson, Sneha Koorse (staff writer), Mike Batistick (staff writer)
Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Holly Taylor, Keidrich Sellati
Plot: An Air Force colonel offers to sell SDI secrets to the KGB. Viola reports the bug in the Weinberger home. Phillip agrees to marry Martha hoping she'll continue spying while Nina confesses to spying for the Americans.
